name: Crackle
text:
Remember, only the Guardians of Hyjal can prevent forest fires.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, June 2025.

name: Umbra
text:
Deep within the jungle, deception can grow like a weed.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: The Jailer
text:
Condemned to rule the ruthless Maw, there are still some cards he can draw.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Seeker
text:
May the fire of exploration light your way... and your soup!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, July 2025.

name: Ahune
text:
Because everyone can use a frozen treat.

Purchasable when available in the shop.
